BadgeDetail.Name: Salon Management - Salon Designer
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can design a salon that meets its needs. They understand how to cost a design and the criteria needed to manage a refit.

Task.Title: Salon design
Task.Body: Upload your salon design document including floor plans, costings and project management criteria.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload your salon design document including floor plans, costings and project management criteria.
Task.TextileBody: Upload your salon design document including floor plans, costings and project management criteria.
